div.div: St. Olaf College vs. Saint John's Univ.

tr.td: SJU won the toss and elected to receive the opening kickoff.
Travis Woods kickoff 46 yards to the SJU19, Max Jackson return 31 yards to the 50 yardline (Ridley Weeks; Tommy Fleetham).
Saint John's Univ. drive start at 15:00.
Kai Barber rush for 12 yards to the STO38, out-of-bounds (Jacob Ossell), PENALTY STO holding 10 yards to the STO28.
Jackson Erdmann pass complete to Evan Clark for 28 yards to the STO00, TOUCHDOWN, clock 14:28.
Zach Barwick kickoff 54 yards to the STO11, Gonzalo Pirela return 11 yards to the STO22 (Drew Glenzinski; Bryan Bowar).
St. Olaf College drive start at 14:23.
Kosey Mitchell rush for loss of 1 yard to the STO21 (David Franta; Peyton Thiry).
Jack Goldstein pass incomplete to Troy Peterson, dropped pass, QB hurry by Peyton Thiry.

Jack Goldstein pass complete to Kosey Mitchell for loss of 4 yards to the STO32 (Ted Kalina; Parker Anderson).

Jack Goldstein pass incomplete to Troy Peterson (Nick Tschida).
